name: Hiss (Playdate)
description:
A twist on an old classic. 

Use your Playdate's crank to steer the snake in any direction and try to beat your high score. A simple game for those moments when you have a Playdate in your hand and a few minutes to burn.

Featuring:

  • High score saved across play sessions
  • A beautiful "16-bit-ish" original song by me, who is definitely not a music composer of any kind
  • Options to reset the high score and disable my beautiful music
